name: Coots The Cat (Web/Mobile)
description:
Disclaimer : One of the cursor hints in Level 14 is misplaced, might need some clickin' to figure it out.

Enjoy a casual short experience with Coots The Cat!

Made from scratch in a mobile app in about 6 days for Ludwig Game Jam 2023!

Mouse (PC) - Touch (Mobile or anything that supports touch)

Hope Yall enjoy!

( > <) 

PS : Have you tried petting the cat? ;3
